text: This article lists the members of the People's Representative Council from 1999 to 2004. The 15th People's Representative Council follows the 1999 Indonesian legislative election held on 7 June 1999. There are 462 elected MPs and 38 appointed MPs in the Parliament. == Speaker and Deputy Speaker == {| class="wikitable" !Name !Photo !Position !Party !Notes |- |Akbar Tandjung |100px |Speaker |Golkar
